Party with Palermo: MVP Global Summit edition – official announcement updated

Posted by jefferypalermo on March 1, 2007

Party with Palermo: MVP Global Summit edition (220+ and
climbing)
website:  http://partywith.palermo.cc
March
11th, 2007 @ 7PM – 11PM
Jillian's Billiard club –
www.jilliansbilliards.com
731 Westlake Ave N
Seattle, WA 98109
(206)
223-0300

Bring a business card to drop in the pot for door prizes!!!!

  • Prizes:  1 XBox360 (courtesy of PreEmptive) , 1 license of ActiveReports.Net
    3.0 Standard.
  • Free to attend
  • Free pool
  • Free food
  • Free drink
  • Free t-shirt
  • Free swag
  • Any MVP gets a free license of Dotfuscator Profession from PreEmptive
  • Any MVP gets a free license of Telerik's control suite.
  • Any MVP gets a free license of DeveloperExpress' product line.
  • Any MVP gets a free license of JetBrains Resharper
  • Newsgator Premium (Newsgator Inbox,
    FeedDemon and Newsgator Go) free for the first 500 attendees.

Sponsors:

  • Vital Insight, Inc.
  • Wrox
  • JetBrains
  • DeveloperExpress
  • Telerik
  • VSoft Technologies
  • DataDynamics
  • PreEmptive Solutions
  • .Net Rocks
  • CodeBetter
  • SupportSpace

I'm going to maintain a list of everyone who has indicated they are
coming.  Please let me know if you are coming so I can plan accordingly.
